Lok Yang TengLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 21 Oct 2018Personally I feel that from IPhone 8 through IPhone XSMax, there's little improvement in specs to justify the huge increase in price. Unless you're a die-hard Apple fan, it'll be more reasonable to choose an older and cheaper model.0 comments0
